      • serializeSubclass

        protected abstract void serializeSubclass(com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator g)
                                   throws IOException
        Writes subclass data for this message. Subclasses are expected to leave the JSON generator in the same state it was in when the method was called. Specifically, this means that any new elements should be closed and the generator should be at the same 'level' of the JSON tree.
        Parameters:
        g - the generator to output to
        Throws:
        IOException
